    The i.MX 7 System-on-Module presents a highly integrated processing platform for low-power products. The i.MX 7 system-on-module feature dual-core 1 GHz ARM Cortex-A7 plus ARM Cortex-M4 real-time coprocessor and provides a wide range of interfaces and high-speed connectivity options including dual 1Gbps Ethernet and certified dual-band WiFi.

     

    Variscite – Your Professional System On Module (SoM) Partner:

    • Variscite is a worldwide leader in the SoM market– serving thousands of satisfied customers for over a decade, providing a full span of solutions to optimize performance, feature-set, and cost of your selected product.
    • Customer oriented support– full software with every development kit, comprehensive hardware documentation, dedicated softwarewiki websitewith step-by-step tutorials and customerportalfor direct access to Variscite’s engineering experts.
    • One stop shop solution full span of SoM portfolio from the entry point and up to high-performance solutions, complemented by custom hardware and software design services tailored to the customer’s specific requirements.
    • Longevity Variscite provides the most generouslongevity plan for its products while committing to continue the production of its SoM solutions.
    • Save time and resources– our off-the-shelf System on Modules are production-ready and designed-to-cost. Together with our internal production lines that allow us to optimize our SoM’s cost/performance, our customers enjoy faster time-to-market to reduce project schedule and overall cost.
    • Reduced risk– Variscite is incorporating proven solutions designed by experts and used by thousands of customers in mass production and in numerous embedded segments, all produced in accordance with strict QA procedures, including ISO9001 and ISO13485 medical certification.
